attributes.action: Provide free wireless internet access in all major cities in the UK
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Norwich already has free wireless broadband in the city centre paid for by the council, the rest of the country should have the same

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "provide free wireless internet access in all major cities in the UK."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page10691.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/wireless/
